title: The Sea of Lucidity: Book 1 of The Eldormaar
description: THE SEA OF LUCIDITY Book 1 in a fast-paced adventure series exploring the sprawling intricacies of multi-world existences. An enchanting fantasy adventure brimming with the suspense and twists of a mystery thriller and topped with a sprinkling of wizardry! Infinite numbers of everything, and everyone. A myriad of worlds, all intrinsically linked, our perception being the only way to differentiate one from another. When he loses his way in the old forest, ranger Taro Brookâ€™s efforts to return to normality lead him to question everything he once took for granted.
author: David Mackay
